articles.content: Paul Scholes can sometimes have a tendency to take things a little too far but his observation in a pre-match discussion of Chelsea that 'I'm not sure I think they're a really good team' was not so o… [+6292 chars]

articles.author: Jake Polden
articles.title: Roy Keane and Gary Neville criticised for comments on Ole Gunnar Solskjaer at Man Utd - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Red Devils were looking to bounce back this weekend after being knocked out of the Champions League by RB Leipzig, but failed to take their chances against Man City
articles.content:
Roy Keane and Gary Neville have both been accused of cronyism for failing to question whether Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is the right man to take Manchester United forward. 
The Red Devils were looking to… [+2044 chars]
